review: Dr Vineeth Arora is highly experienced physician and I have been getting treatment since 2013. During Covid pandemic, Dr Arora timely treatment over Whatsapp helped me lot and I able to get cured only because of his out of the box treatment. A soft spoken, very humble and treatment with human touch are few of his qualities. He is best doctor in the country. Dr Narender Nagarwal

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I do not recommend this doctor to anyone. Need to wait Atleast 2-3 hours.
One of my relative went there for his stomach pain and continue vomiting with carrying his blood test and ultrasound reports, in which clearly mentioned that he has 6mm stone and  15 mm cyst above on left kidney.

He gave him medicine for 5 days and asked for to do repeat the test and come again.
After 5 days we again went to his clinic with new report.
he said no problem all report are okay **** ** ******** ********** **** ***** *** ******* ** ** ********Even after taking 5 days of medicine no changes.
When i asked him to explain the Report anything is serious or not?

Doctor shouted on me and said I can't explain you every meaning of report and if you want to know more about it go and do costly tests and do other investigations.

We were amazed with that behaviour 
If we are patients and we are paying Rs.800 for 5 min consultation after waiting for 2-3 hours.
We have right to know about our report our disease.
Sorry but i really disappointed with his behaviour and they way he shouted on me after asking report results.
The way he discuss with the patients is such a relief for patients. Friendly nature helps heal the disease sooner. And also prescribes good
Doctor is not ready to listen the full problem of patient. **** **** **** ****** ** write medicine with out listening the full details of problems of patient. Not good experience.
